Text: I was looking for something that wasn't too complicated to use and to help the pics I post on Ebay show more detial.  This camera is great, wonderfully small, and has attactive hi-tech casing.  Very easy to use for someone like me who's just hopping on the digital camera bandwagon.  I love not having to go to Walgreen's to get my pictures develpoed anymore!  Definitely a good investment.
